alert.note: Alert for Billings; Dunn (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:13PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF DUNN, NORTHEASTERN BILLINGS AND SOUTHEASTERN MCKENZIE COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/... At 813 PM CDT/713 PM MDT/, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles north of Dunn Center to 12 miles south of Manning. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Killdeer, Dunn Center, Manning, Mandaree, South Fairfield, Mckenzie Bay Recreation Area, Twin Buttes, Little Missouri State Park, Oakdale, and Fort Berthold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
